name: Shadow Tap
description:
Gamejam Winner 2st Place!

This game was made for 36 hours for Coderspace Gamejam. Theme was one tap 2 core mechanics.

You only have the ability to jump in the first level. Then jump with the left side of the screen and attack with the right side. You cannot advance without killing red-eyed enemies and you have to jump over the children.

You may get browser error when you die in webgl mode. I recommend you to play the apk.

Develop: Taha Erel
Design: Taha Erel & Mustafa Yaman
